content: the pumpkin is made from a flat rectangle piece so no crocheting in the round to make this pattern you need to know the bobble stitch bobble stitch *yarn over and insert hook pull up a loop as if you were going to do a double_crochet yarn over and pull through 2 loops* repeat * to * 3 more times until you have 5 loops on hook yarn over and pull through all 5 loops on hook bobble stitch made
